title: Mineral Mining in China
description: Lake Qarhan is the largest salt lake in China, covering some 5,856 square kilometers (2,261 square miles). The lake is a playa, a basin that fills with water only occasionally. The playa contains nine smaller but more permanent shallow salt lakes.
